hl.seg: France has supported the proposal.

doc.seg: The Chairman of the Committee of the Summit, Mushahid Hussain Syed said in the Committee meeting on Friday at the Parliament House about the proposal on the relief goods to Palestine and that a Parliamentary delegation has been sent.
After the meeting, Mushahid Hussain Syed said to the representatives of media that the Committee at France has welcomed the proposal for the relief work for the affected people in the Gaza Strip.
He said that the Israeli attack is a crime on humanity and that all the countries should condemn the attacks.
Mushahid Hussain while criticizing the world to double standards said that the people should be against terrorism, but they are still against the Palestinians in the attacks.
The foreign affairs Minister in the Senate Standing Committee Chairman and the leaders of the Muslim Ummah were also criticized.
He said that the Committee expressed hope that the newly elected President of the United States Barak will address the Muslim Ummah in his first one hundred days.
Mushahid Hussain Syed said that Muslims and the West would give not only the emergency steps for Kashmir but also for the long standing problems like Palestine.
Imaduddin Khan, the Minister of External Affairs and the state of the committee said that Saudi Arabia attended the meeting for the foreign ministers of the Islamic countries of the Organization.

The emergency meeting by Israel as the result of the attacks was summoned. He said that the fashion of Palestine is aware and that the Government of other countries should be in touch with leaders in this regard.
The Minister of External Affairs of state said that the Palestine issues should be resolved according to the UN resolutions .
Two journalists from Arab countries attended the meeting on the latest situation of Palestine.
On the other hand, the International University students went on a protest at Islamabad against the Israeli attacks on Palestine.
The demonstrators also raised banners and slogans against Israel.

hl.seg: In order to be safer from flu quit dieting.

doc.seg: According to the American Scientist this research has come out after much experimentations on rats.
Experimentaions have proved that those rats on less calories diet have developed a tendency of not overcoming the flu virus .
This Research has proved the very old saying wrong that it is good to starve while in fever.
According to the scientist a patient should eat more while in fever.

According to the Researchers of the State of Michigan University diet taking rats have less strength to fight with the infection and also their chances of death increased whereas earlier those rats on common diet had more strength to fight with the flu virus.
According to the Professor Elizabeth Cardener The people on dieting will be more infectious to the flu virus and will also take long time to recover from this disease.
HE also says that those people who have taken Flu vaccinations also should quit dieting during few months of summer to keep this virus away.

hl.seg: The first nuclear test was in 1990.

doc.seg: Thomas red who was a former director of the Cooperation in the National Laboratory technical committees in Los Angeles, United States has written this book.
The book with the title 'nuclear express the political history: bomb and the proliferation' was written by two writers says that the country has also tested the atom bomb and has nuclear secrets.
Thomas red has said in an interview to the USAID news in 1970 that when Benazir Bhutto was the leader in Pakistan in 90's, China had tested its first nuclear bomb experiment.
Thomas red said that there are many reasons to believe China has tested its first nuclear bomb.
There are informations that China has scientists who had designed the bomb.
He further said that this was the reason why India and Pakistan tested the nuclear bomb in 1990 within just two weeks.
Thomas Red has reminded that in 1970 Russia did a nuclear test in response to the United States within 17 days though United States took long time for the test.
He further said that in May 1998, Pakistan has mentioned about the atom bomb experiment in the Pakistani scientists confidence.
When Thomas red was questioned about the nuclear technology that China has provided to Pakistan, he said in response that they have the common enemy India.
He said that the proof is with the Chinese designer Dr. Khan after which the documents from Libya in this connection have been confirmed.
The question of the nuclear tests are by the United States and the British in the deserts.
He said that Israel has also experienced the results.
To Thomas red the question about China's nuclear program is the proliferation.
Thomas red said that from 1970 to 1991 the Iranian city of China has set up the nuclear installation for the raw material and to provide instructions.
In addition to this, China has also provided an Uranium plant to Iran.
He said that there are relations between China, North Korea, Iran, Syria, Egypt, Libya, Pakistan and Yemen providing nuclear technology.

hl.seg: 2008 The best year for Madonna

doc.seg: This show was arranged on the basis of Madonna's 'album Hard Candy' and it also included few songs with Gypsy or Nomadic band of Ukraine and Justin Timberland.
An old racing car was also placed on the stage in the show.
The second successful show of the year 2008 by profit was Celine Dion who earned 236,600,000 dollars.
Canadian show 'Taking Chances' toured 24 countries whereas Madonna went to 17 countries which is her first tour in previous 8 years.
The director for both singers was Jimmy King, who also organized the 'Reunion' tour of 'Spice Girls'.
Madonna has broken her own record of the year 2006.
In 2006 she earned 193,700,000 dollars through 'Confession Concerts'.
Pollster has awarded Bon Jovi as the third most successful singer who earned 176,000,000 dollars.
Bruce Springsteen was on number 3 by earning 166,000,000 dollars and Police get the 5th position by earning 120,600,000 dollars.

According to this periodical in 2008 very few people participated in singing programs and concerts in North America and only those people attended the programs who were ready to buy expensive tickets.
In America a ticket is increased by an average of 8 percent by cost yearly, Most expensive ticket was sold of 300 dollars at Madonna's show.
The editor of Pollster Gary Bongioni said in prospect of international financial crisis year 2008 proved to be good.
He predicted 2009 a good year for U2 and Springsteen whose albums are about to release.

hl.seg: Ban on coeducation: Taliban

doc.seg: Local Talibans of Gul Bahadur group have distributed a pamphlet in Miran Shah (Capital of Southern Waziristan) and in other Tehsils in which government and semi government coeducational institutes have been threatened.
Pamphlet included that if coeducation institutes are not closed till 5th of January, action will be taken against them.
Pamphlet said that women are banned to have ID Cards for government aid and for educational purposes and women are prohibited to go to NADRA's Offices in all Tehsils.
The announcement on the ban of women ID Card has been made at the time when almost 200 women have submitted forms in NADRA Offices in Southern Waziristan for Benazir Income Support Program.
According to local people the pamphlet issued by Taliban was announced on the loudspeakers of all the Masjids.
However it was not mentioned in the letter that separate educational institute for woman are banned or not.
According to Pamphlet after this announcement any woman caught in the school for getting education or in NADRA's Office for having ID Card will be punished religiously along with her family.
Moreover Police of District Bannu says on Sunday a landmine exploded on Miram Shah Bannu Road in result of that a traveler died and one is injured.
Injured has been admitted in Civil Hospital.

hl.seg: More bodies were recovered from the target killings.

doc.seg: According to the police, it was on Sunday morning at the Green Chowk Mingora areas Sohrab Khan Chowk that two bodies were moved to the head off.
The Police said that they were killed in the Frontier Corps.
The dead bodies were found at 11 pm and witnesses say that a letter was there near the dead bodies which said that they themselves are responsible for their deaths.
Local people say that at around 11 pm dead bodies were lying in the market. But however the security personnels have shifted the two bodies.
Incidents of target killings have increased to a dangerous extent in the location of Mingora and the near areas during the last few weeks.
In which it is mostly common citizens including women and security personnels were killed.
According to the local sources, such incidents involve more than 30 people in the operation.
So far no organization has owned the responsibility for the killings.
On Saturday the spokesman of Taliban told BBC in the local Taliban Swat Muslim Khan that three bodies of his colleagues were found on Friday which included that of the Taliban commander Rafi.
Muslim Khan said that Rafi was under the custody of the security forces for the last one and a half months.
He said that when the local Taliban killed they first issued a notice on the other hand. This has put the common citizens in the Mingora area to anxiety.
The local people in Mingora said that a large contingent of security forces are deployed to control the attacks. But in spite of this, attack of citizens have increased.

hl.seg: A musical tribute to Benazir by Bakhtawar

doc.seg: A rap song (a modern music genre) recorded in Bakhtawar's voice is now posted on YouTube.
The song is of five minutes duration and portrays Benazir's life through pictures and clips.
The eighteen years old singer is a student of Edinburgh University.
She has a deep interest in singing and poetry.
It is believed that she started singing after being encouraged by her mother and that too only as a hobby.
She paid tribute to her mother and said that she was both intelligent and beautiful and that she did everything in her own way.
Talking about the incident of 27th December she told that her mother was shot on the temple. She died at an age of 54 and left behind 3 children.
The whole nation is seeking its direction without her and she is present in everyone's heart.
Miss Bakhtawar is the second child of Benazir Bhutto behind her 20 years old brother, Bilawal Bhutto.
She has been taking a keen interest in music from the start.

Its believed that before her mother's return to Pakistan, she tried to have a meeting arranged with the Grammy Award winner music producer and rapper Puff Daddy through a friend, who is a journalist but this meeting never took place.
Miss Bakhtawar's poetry has been translated and published in some Sindhi Newspapers, but this is the first time that her voice is being heard through YouTube.
The workers and followers of Benazir Bhutto have started recording CDs of her song.
Mr. Farhatullah Babar, spokesman of Pakistan Peoples Party has confirmed that both the song’s poetry and vocals on YouTube are performed by Bakhtawar.

He was speaking on phone from Islamabad and said that it is a tribute of a grieve stricken daughter to her courageous mother and has been aired by Pakistan Television, the national television network of Pakistan.
He further stated that the Peoples Party has not made any plans to distribute the music CDs by Miss Bakhtawar as yet.
He said that a few months back a fake account of the young Bilawal Bhutto Zardari, the chairman of Pakistan Peoples Party, was made on the website of FaceBook which was later closed down.

hl.seg: Rocket Fire from Lebanon too, and bombing in response.

doc.seg: Israeli Army and Police officials have informed the press that four rockets were launched from Lebanon on to Israeli land, one of which hit the Northern part of Israel in Naharia, which injured two people.
In response to the rockets launched from Lebanon, Israeli tanks bombed Lebanon.
It's not certain that this attack was Hezbollah related or if aggravated Palestinian terrorists are behind this.
The Lebanese government has said that they are also trying to investigate who is behind these rocket attacks.
The reporters of BBC have declared this an entirely volatile and dangerous situation.
According to the Head of the Middle East sector of BBC, Jeremy Button, these rocket attacks have increased the chances of spreading the war.
In the past few days, it is feared that the Investigation in Gaza might reach to the Northern part of Lebanon and to the Israeli border.
Israeli forces have executed around 60 aerial attacks on the Gaza strip between Wednesday and Thursday night.
According to the Israeli army, the Hamas Police offices, tunnels, weapon stores, rocket launching areas and armed individuals were targeted in these attacks.
Aside from Aerial attacks, Gaza was also bombed all night from the Israeli and Bahria tank bases.
Palestinian sources say that a mosque was destroyed in these aerial attacks on Gaza.
According to some unverified sources, Israeli tanks are closing in on the area of Khan Younis with aerial help from helicopters.
In the last twelve days, around 700 Palestinians have been killed, a majority of which have been women and children.
On the other hand, 11 Israeli soldiers have also lost their lives.
Israeli Security Forces have confirmed that a high ranked officer, Amos Gailad, has left for Cairo to discuss conditions of a ceasefire.
A member of Hamas is also leaving to Cairo to have talks with the Egyptian Ambassador.
Also, a member of the Palestinian authority, Mahmood Abbas, will be reaching Cairo on Friday.

hl.seg: My heart is broken, give me back my kidney.

doc.seg: Dr. Richard Batista has said that eight years ago, he gifted his wife Danelle with his kidney to save her life.
According to some press reports, Dr. Batista has said that his wife repaid him for his gift by betraying him, having relations with someone else, and petitioning for divorce.
In an interview with a local paper, Dr. Batista said that this situation has left him with a hole in his heart.
According to Dr. Richard Batista's lawyer, he is asking for his kidney back, but in reality is looking for monetary compensation for his kidney.
According to his wife, they will be appearing before a judge in this matter, in the next few days.

hl.seg: 140 year old, 9 kilo lobster Freed.

doc.seg: ""George the Giant Lobster"" was caught in the sea two weeks earlier.
A seafood company of the city had bought him for 100 dollars.
And immediately starting using the lobster as means of their advertisement.
But a group for animal rights, ""Pita"", demanded the lobster's release and now he has been released in the sea again.
George was caught in a sea in Canada, after which he spent ten days in the tank of ""City Crab and Seafood Company.""
The age of a lobster can usually be determined by its weight.
According to the restaurant manager, Keith Wallanty, they did not mean any harm to the lobster, and put him in the tank only to arouse curiosity amongst their customers.
According to a member of Pita, Ingrid Newkirk, the decision of the restaurant is admirable and is an example to those who only want to keep the animal in a tank or boil them and eat them.

hl.seg: Girl traced with the help of Mobile.

doc.seg: When officials came to know about Natali Maltrice, firefighters and police force of Athol city of Massachusetts started the action.
Officials located the exact location of the girl with the help of GPS in her mobile.
However with the help of Google Street View she was found in a hotel.
A week earlier Natali's grandmother Rose Maltice took Natali with her from supervision of her legal parents.
The police chief of Athol Timothy Anderson told BBC, she said that now she will never return Natali and then she left the state.
Police Contacted Mrs. Maltice, but when he did not returned Natali despite of promise then police decided to find him with the help of Natali's cell.
Since 2005 it is in the law of America that Mobile companies have to provide location of callers 67 percent of callers at a distance of 100 meters and 95 percent of at 300 meters.

hl.seg: Hamid Karzai on India's tour

doc.seg: It is the 2nd tour of India by Hamid Karzai in last five months.
It is hoped that he will discuss the state of affairs after the terrorists attack on Mumbai while in meeting with Prime Minister Manmohan Singh.
During this tour he wishes to deliver emotions of Afghanistan and her people and express his unanimity with India.
During this tour of Karzai other then extremism bilateral trade will also be discussed.
Bilateral cooperation between the two for countering extremism is also hoped to be discussed.
During his last tour of India President Hamid Karzai said that extremism will not be allowed to hinder the relations of the two countries.
He also said that Both India and Afghanistan are facing the challenge of extremism, ruthless and assassination activities.
Peace and solidarity in both the countries is beneficial for the area and the world as well.
We understand the fact that both countries and the whole world unanimously can eliminate the curse of terrorism.
It must be noted that Karzai had blamed Pakistani Secret agency ISI for attack on Indian Embassy in Kabul in July last year.
4 Indians and an officer of IFS were killed in this attack.

After the attack on Embassy during the Karzai's tour of India Manmohan Singh said that the attack was on the friendship of India and Afghanistan, we have agreed that will not allow extremism to hinder our relations.

hl.seg: A special Judge has been nominated for hearing Mumbai attack.

doc.seg: The Mumbai police commissioner Hassan Ghafoor said that the extremists involved with the Mumbai attacks were arrested alive.The accused Ajmal Ameer is the only terrorist arrested with this case.
Also a special lawyer has been appointed on behalf of the accused for the case.
Ajmal is in the police custody currently and it is expected that the police may be filing a charge sheet against him before January 24.
The Ajmal asks for a lawyer to defend himself.
He has sent an appeal letter to the Pakistan government asking for legal Help.
It is said that evidences are available to say that Pakistani extremists has some relations with the attacks of Mumbai, India.
Pakistan has accepted that Ajmal is a citizen of Pakistan.
According to the police case, additional police commissioner Ashok, Police Inspector Vijay and six more policemen were killed while Ajmal and his companion Abu Ismail were caught.
Ismail Khan died in the police action and police have arrested Ajmal alive.
A lawyer has not yet been nominated in the case on behalf of the Ajmal.
The Government has accepted to give the legal aid cell. The lawyer Danish palpable was nominated but he refused to take the case because of the moral grounds.
Lawyers from opposition political party have been protesting against this.

Prime minister said parliament has all rights for making decisions.

In one of his answers he also said that leader retired General Parwez Musharraf has been asked to quit the position of army prime minister and Pakistani chair person Benazzir Bhutto have also their roles very important who gave emphasis on universal brotherhood and also emphasized on leader parwez Musharraf to remove his uniform
He also said that American leader Jobatin is in favor of pakistan and south and for his services leader of pakistan has titled him with honor.

After Mumubai attack every kind of relationship between India and Pakistan will be broken regarding this answering a question Yussof Raza lihalini told Indian government are under pressure hence they give this type of warnings

hl.seg: The dismissal of journalists was protested.

doc.seg: On Tuesday, the journalists in Islamabad went on a protest in front of the press club. Newspaper workers, journalists of TV channels, and the employees of newspapers and large number of the media owners raised the protest slogans.

Addressing the protestors, the journalists of big newspapers in Federal Union of Journalists of Pakistan and senior members said that the politicians were protested today. The newspaper owners of small group were holding due to the fear on the rights of journalists.

He said that the Human Rights to the newspaper owners should be given to these organizations. The punishment and impressment camp of workers may lead to loss of billions of rupees in spite of the annual profits.

The example of this is that channel five, a private TV at Lahore. A member commited suicide for not recieving salary and many workers today also forced over non-payment of salaries for months because of which they are spending their lives with tension.
He said that the TV and newspaper owners went on a permanent protest in front of parliament saying that steps should be taken for the rights of journalists.
Salman, the governor of Punjab and solar energy criticised to an Urdu newspaper Today about the employees not given any notice.
Dozens of employees were also dismissed at The daily Jinnah, Daily News Channel, Plus Five, Business TV and TV today.

The BJP and the secretary general of the demonstrators Mazhar Abbas said while addressing to the country today that his journalist organizations and journalists of the newspaper tied black bandages on their arms claiming the rights of journalists.
According to the Pakistan Mazhar Abbas 85 percent of workers at newspapers and TV channels are being exploited without any agreement at the place where he is working.

He said that so far, more than 200 journalists and workers at newspapers and TV channels are being removed in the current year by the owners and feared that hundreds of more workers may be dismissed because of the economic crisis.

The movement Mazhar Abbas Attiya for journalists will continue until the dismissed employees are restored and the newspaper workers wages are determined by the seventh board. The implementation of the award by the TV channels, and newspapers for the employees and the salary has been stopped for many months.

hl.seg: The virus has affected 35 lakh consumers.

doc.seg: The first virus was identified on 8 October, 2008 and was named later.
The criteria for sites to deal with the virus, and a plot to take was developed. But nearly 35 million computers were affected by this.
Experts say that the computers affected may be even more than this.
For dealing with the consumers meeting the criteria for sites to the 'zero zero associate 2000 suture' plight needs to be used.
The criteria for sites that has visits from hundreds or thousands of people to file using the virus 'services Cork E. E.', should have a search and include a Code.
After this, the virus in the enthusiastic leap XP system of an LLB will be in any of the file.
Is this virus in the name of this file creation.
Then the registration of XP details in the computer will change.
The virus after active comes into the machine and the server and accommodate a point to change.
After this, the download of files from the Web site becomes slow.
Depending upon the criteria of sites in the world, the virus affects the computers in different countries.
This includes countries like Brazil, China, Russia, India, the United States and Britain.

hl.seg: Delivery of The Indian Information.

doc.seg: After the meeting, the Interior Ministry talked to the representatives of media on Saturday about India.
The issue of help for the investigation.
He said that Pakistan is an independent country from India, and is not receiving any information by the investigation of the country.
Daily calls will not be accepted.
He said that in addition to the information recieved, other informations are also given by India.
The interior minister said that atleast 124 members of the Peace team are feared to have been arrested under the law-enforcing the banned organization.
And if there is nothing against some people, then the evidence of action against the innocent people will be released.
In response to a question, he said that a person was arrested in connection with India and action will be taken according to the Pakistani laws.
He said that the action will be taken against the people of FIA under the law.

In response to a question, he said that the Indian law enforcing agencies in Mumbai has given the information to the international community in 42 days and he hopes that the investigation will be for India and Pakistan at the same time.
The government has to offer again to repeat the investigation of Mumbai incident and a joint team should be formed.
It should be noted that a three-member team was formed from India for the Mumbai attacks under the leadership of additional director general of the FIA.
Pakistan is to investigate on the Information.

Pakistan's High Commissioner Shahid Malik met the President Asif Ali Zardari and has clarified that if any Pakistani individual or group was found to be involved in attacks of Mumbai then action will be taken in India and Pakistan.

hl.seg: Everything is possible in America

doc.seg: Mr Obama took the oath on 20th january as the fortieth president of America
Tomorrow there will be an address on the stairs of the Lincoln Memorial which has been built to honor the 16th President of the United States in Washington
Mr Obama said that America is facing one of the greatest challanges in its history , but he was very hopeful that America will take control of all the problems
Abrahim Lincoln freed the nations from the shakles of slavery.
And with it Mr Obama said that our country is facing a lot of hardships and it will take some time to get out of them and it will be a tough way out.
But apart from this , I am still hopeful that ideological founder of this nation the will remain alive
Other then Iraq and Afghanistan war, America has also been facing extreme financial crisis
Special arrangements have been made for the oath taking cermony
According to management two million people are attending this gathering
Monday is a national holiday in America because on this day one of the greatest saviour of human rights, Martin Luther King was being assisinated
Martin Luther King was black in race

hl.seg: Tribute to Martin Luther King, Devoted to work

doc.seg: Dr. Martin Luther King was assassinated in 1968.
Barack Obama tributed Dr. King and asked Americans to work with united effort for fulfilling their promises.
In Washington preparations are taking place for the arrangements of unprecedented gathering of people for the new President oath ceremony on Tuesday.
Almost two million people are expected to gather to see this historical President Oath.
Barack Obama has started Monday by visiting a medical center in Northern Washington where he met wounded American soldiers afterwards he went to a shelter for homeless and painted a wall.
Talking to correspondents Barack Obama said: The current crisis we are having and the problems many people are facing,in this situation we can't sit and relax.
He said that Martin Luther King has spent his life in serving people.
Barack Obama said that today when we are remembering him, this is not the day to stay and think. It is the day to act.
He said that Tuesday's ceremony will be held on the same place where thousands of people gathered for Martin Luther King's 'I have a dream' in 1963.
In this speech Martin Luther King said that the day will come when people will not be differentiated on the base of their color.
Mathew Price of BBC says that it is the tragedy of history that the day of Martin Luther is 24 hours earlier then the day when first black President of America will sworn in.
For many in southern states of America the Presidency of Barack Obama, will be the interpretation of Martin Luther King's dream.

hl.seg: British Hacker wins in court

doc.seg: 42 years British citizen has admitted that he had hacked American Army website.
Gary is suffering from Asperger syndrome. Keep in mind that the patient of Asperger syndrome has insanity of doing similar tasks.
According to his lawyers, it is feared he may attempt suicide if handed over to America .
All government attorneys says that there are very fewer doubts about Gary's health.
Lord Justice Moors and Mr. Justice Simon has said that Gary is permitted to file an application for reconsideration in the British court.
Gary's lawyers stated in the court that if Garry is kept away from his family and home, he can commit suicide.
Further they said that Interior Secretary did not consider this issue.
But government's attorneys says that Interior Secretary had used his powers.
Gary has never denied of hacking American Army website.
Gary hacked American Computer Systems in 2001 and 2002 due to which American Government suffered a loss of 8,00,000 dollars.
Gary hacked 97 systems including American Naval and NASA.
However Gary says that they did not hack with wrong intentions, rather they were looking for the information on aliens which they think were kept secret by American Government.
Gary's mother Jenes Sharp said that she is happy of the decision.
Gary's lawyer said it's a good decision.
This case is in the court since 2002 and at last a correct decision.

hl.seg: The commander of Kashmir: Two persons were killed

doc.seg: The Lieutenant Colonel of Indian army deployed in Jammu told BBC that Jammu and Kashmir police men has recieved information about 24 rashtria jantadal rifles in the authentical district, gandwah Doda district and in the jungle of Haus.
He fired on the army and when the army was in action, two armed extremist were killed.

The spokesman said that the extremists had killed two persons in the 12 years in the district of Hizbul where the Mujahideen has been active from 1960 in this district. The commander is also an expert in landmine blast.
It is suspected that Sajjad Hussain may be associated with it.
According to the bid, the rural areas are still in an operation according to the extremists. Two Kalashnikov rifles were also recovered by the army in the first phase .
The head of the police for the province of Urdu urged yesterday to cooperate to make this year the most peaceful year.
It is worth mentioning that there has been no violence in the November and December during the assembly elections.
In these elections, there has been more than 100 candidates.
Hizbul Mujahideen has made it clear that there has been no attack in the last 18 years in Jammu and Kashmir.
The opposition party announced in the year 2000 July for the first time after which, the Government of India and opposition party had talks with commanders.
However, it was only within 15 days when the ceasefire was finished.
Later, Hizbul Mujahideen has killed many high commanders.
It was written in the famous newspaper 'Daily News' of Pakistan on Thursday, about the Pakistan extremists living in Kashmir and the groups of Hizbul Mujahideen Lashkar-e-Tayaba.
It should be kept in mind that now with the policy of two organizations the Kashmir issue can be resolved through the armed resistance.

hl.seg: Dera Bugti: Explosion on gas pipe line

doc.seg: According to police officials 18 inches diameter pipeline of Loti Gas Field to Pir Koh has been destroyed by explosion.
This pipeline is directed towards Sui Plant.
Moreover pretending himself as the interpreter of banned organization Baloch Republican Army has accepted the responsibility of the explosion on behalf of his organization on phone.
4th pipeline was exploded in four days.
An 18 inch diameter pipeline was destroyed in Dera Allah Yar on Friday whose mending was continued till Sunday morning.
General Manager of Sui Southern Gas Company Mushtaq Siddiqui told in Quetta that this supply line will be restarted after noon.
This pipeline arrives in Quetta via Sibbi.

There is intense scarcity of gas since 3 days in Quetta, Ziarat and suburb areas where on one one hand snowfall is continued and temperature has dropped below freezing point and on the other hand heater and stoves are not working.
Further in the city of Dera Bugti a motorbike exploded in animal market but according to police no casualties.

hl.seg: Four new members have been added into the cabinet yesterday.

doc.seg: Among the new members included in the cabinet are, two from the Hard Community Moment and the other two are from the Jamiat-ulamaye-Islam (fazlur-Rahman) group.
Asif Ali Zardari had taken oaths from the new ministers.
There present in the oath ceremony were Prime Minister Yousuf Raza Gilani and other members of the cabinet.
After the appointment of four new ministers in the cabinet, new ministers and other new members, the size of the cabinet have increased in number.

Two Ministers from M.Q.M goup- Farooq Sattar and Babar Ghori were Present.Besides them there were Azam Sawati and Ata-ur-Rahman of Jamiat-ulamaye-islam Fazlur-Rahman group, also present in the ceremony.
The Selection announcement of the Tahal N has not been done yet.
Farooq Sattar is the Convenor of the Group M.Q.M Whereas Babar Ghori is Senator of that group and their tenure is going to end on 10th March .
Azam Sawati had been appointed as a private senator and was included among rich and famous senators.
Maulana Ata-ur-Rahman is a member of communal Assembly and is also a younger brother of Fazlur-Rahman.
It should be well-remembered that in these agreements four members of the main mushiran communal assembly were not present.

As it is a history that on 3rd-nov-2008, 22 new ministers and 18 other new members were included in the cabinet. so there were plans to include members from M.Q.M group as well. But due to the Chances of misconceptions M.Q.M group members were not included.

hl.seg: Baluchistan, pipeline has been exploded

doc.seg: According to police it is an 18 inches of diameter pipeline which runs to Sui Gas Plant from various wells of Pir Koh and it was exploded by some unknown armed persons early in the morning.
Moreover yesterday well number 3 was completely destroyed by explosives and a pipeline was damaged in explosion near Dera Allah Yar.
The responsibility has been accepted by Sarbaz Baluch on behalf of his organization an interpreter of banned organization of Baluch Liberation Army.
Incidents of terrorism have increased in the beginning of 2009.
In this months dozens of pipelines have been exploded whereas attacks on trains and Punjabis have multiplied.
Chief Minister Baluchistan Nawab Aslam Raeesani has though shown anxiety on these incidents and ordered police to share information with secret agencies but yet these incidents couldn't be stopped.

hl.seg: 819 billion dollars package approved for economic reinstatement

doc.seg: No member of Republican Party has voted for this plan of President Obama.
According to Republican members this plan is too 'expensive' and will not be effective.
In the House this package 244 votes were casted in favor and 188 against.
The plan of economic reinstatement will be presented in Senate next week where ruling Democratic party has little majority.
It is feared that due to the strong opposition from Republican party approval from Senate will not be easy.
After the approval of economic reinstatement plan from the House Barak Obama insisted the members not to hinder political opposition to this important plan.
President said this plan which he is hopeful of becoming a law till next month will help in establishing a favorable atmosphere in which American trade will get better.

According to this plan common people and traders will have relief of 75 billion dollars debt and 500 billion will be allocated for renovation of roads, bridges, 10,000 schools, unemployment allowance and for research of new technology.

Washington's correspondent of BBC has said that Barak Obama had resolved to introduce a new political culture by ignoring the political differences but discussion on this economic package has produce bitterness in the politics.
In the House The members of Republican party declared government's proposed bill as wastage of government finances and said that it will not be helpful in creating new opportunities for employment.
They insisted on the bill proposed by their party in which rebate on taxes is focused more.
They said by their package very less investment will be able to generate more employment opportunities.
They said that in place of construction plans, rebate in taxes can produce instant and more employment opportunities.

hl.seg: ""Attacks were not planned in Pakistan""

doc.seg: Wajid Shams ul Hassan while talking to Indian channel 'NDTV' said that the Pakistani investigations report about Mumbai attacks will be released soon.
More than 170 people were killed in last November's Mumbai attacks.
According to India extremist organization Lashkre Taiba is responsible for the attacks.
India also said that 'state elements' of Pakistan were involved in Mumbai attacks.
The mutual relations of the two countries are affected.
High Commissioner Wajid Shams ul Hassan delivered his first statement about Pakistani investigations which shows, what could be in the investigations report.
Wajid Shams ul Hassan said: As for as the result of investigators, Pakistani soil was not used.
It can be any other place, not also England.
I was worried about these two places(Pakistan and England).

India and International community has pressurized Pakistan to take action against the responsible s of Mumbai attacks. Pakistan says that she has arrested dozens of workers of the groups who are supposed to be involved in Mumbai attacks
Wajid Shams ul Hassan said: We are not trying to hide it.
We believe in taking actions on facts.
Our investigations will be acceptable for the world.
We will try to satisfy India through the results(investigation's).
While defending the delay in the Pakistani investigations he said that the collection, understanding and verification of such a materiel takes time.
High Commissioner Wajid Shams ul Hassan said it took India 5 days to present her dossier.

hl.seg: The role of European Union for the peace in Middle East

According to the official stand of Brussels, Schwarzenberg delegation or efforts of Sarkozy are helping hands in this process.
European Union spokesman Amadeu Altafaj said every single step which may help in delivering the conjoint message of European Union to fighting parties is appreciable.

The role of Czech Republic as the President of the Union is already weak
plus internal affairs has made her helpless.
On the other hand the course of action of French President Sarkozy depicts that France is still the President of European Union.
Although 6 months Presidency tenure of France is over.
Sarkozy wants to play a leading role which he is capable of, but he isn't the authority.
French Foreign Minister Bernard Kouchner is facing the funniest side.

Schwarzenberg says that Israel has the right to defend herself, while according to Kouchner war is not the defense. Germany has also sent a special ambassador to Middle East. As long as European Union does not show unanimous stand, she can not be successful on diplomatic front.

hl.seg: Financial crisis: German millionaire industrialist's suicide

doc.seg: Adolf Marclay, resident of Swabia in south Germany has left behind a huge industrialist group.
But he was not known to German public a while back.
when he had to negotiate with 30 banks for weeks regarding his debts towards industrial groups, he became the hot news and could see the dark future for Marckay group.
Marclay Group had to bear the loss of hundreds of million euros after it bought the shares of one of known industry Folks Wigan.
then the financial institutes rejected to provide the much needed 100 Million and 1 billion euros to this group and this exerted severe pressure on Marclay.

Recently the same banks accepted to provide loan to Marclay group on urgent basis but Adolf Marclay who started as a small industrialist to reach a place where his industrial group's annual income reached 30 billion euros, couldn't bear the the loss in his financial strength.
After the death of his father when Adolf Marclay took the responsibility of the business he used modern methods and made the business more successful.
He named his company Ratiopharm which is now Germany's most successful and biggest pharmaceutical company.

Till recent times this phamasutical company had a budget of around 5 to 6 billion euros and even now it is earning around 8 billion euros annually. After the great success of Rasue farm the Marclay Group bought many big industries like Hi-Del Barag Cement a manufacture of construction equipment. Kassbohrer and other good car maker
Marclay Group has a employee number of around 100 thousand around the world and among its industries, Rasue Farm has always been given special importance.
Adolf Marclay has said this many times in his life. ""We have been in pharma business since four generations"".
Now the industry is handled by the children and i hope that it continues to work for few hundred years by our family.

After the suicide of Adolf Marclay,the banks have given approval of temporary loan of 400 million euro for his group VEM but on this condition that VEM have to be sold to Rasio Farm so that the financial position of this group is improved on long term basis.
After the death of Adolf Marclay the Marclay Group will not remain the same as it was before.

hl.seg: Crime rate of foreigners living in Germany

doc.seg: According to recent statistics the crime rate of foreigners between 2004 to 2007 .22
9 percent has reduced to .21
4 percent.
According to Joachim Herrmann the Interior Minister of Bavaria it is only an apparent positive change.
He said: It must be considered that foreigners having the German citizenship are increasing.
So it must be added in the statistics that though the criminal is a German citizen but his background is foreigner.
Herrmann said that from 2010 his state will keep this fact in mind while collecting the data of criminals.
Other than Bavaria, Hemberg is also working on same pattern.

Senator Christoph Ahlhaus of Interior ministry from CDU said:"" When the scientific research is conducted one can not draw results of his own rather they depend on the data which is calculated after research.

Ahlhaus presented an analysis report of provincial office of crime management prepared in 2006, according to which in the Bergdorf area of Hemberg the percentage of foreigners in the crimes committed there was calculated.
Results indicate that here foreigners
crime rate is less then the crimes committed in the whole province.
On the contrary during 2006 when youth crime rate in Berlin was observed revealed that the youth having the foreign background was .44
7 percent.

Other political parties of Germany like SPD, clean atmospherics party Greens, and leftist party Linkspartei are against the of gathering information whether the background of a German citizen is foreign while collecting the data about crimes.

hl.seg: Elected Vice President of America Joseph Biden reaches Pakistan

doc.seg: Foreign Minister received the elected Vice President of America
America's Vice President Joseph Biden has reached Islamabad on his visit to Pakistan on Friday with his delegation.
Foreign Minister Shah Mehmood Qureshi and high ups of American Embassy received them.
American Senator Lindsy Graham is also accompanying Biden.

Press Officer of American Embassy Lew Fenter told Voice of America, during his tour newly elected President will discuss several regional affairs with Pakistani Leadership, however he refused to disclose further details.
According to Foreign Office Joseph Biden will also meet Army Chief General Ashfaq Pervez Kiani along with high ups of government.

hl.seg: America must remain vigilant against enemy attacks: Bush

doc.seg: President George Bush insisted America to be vigilant against enemy attacks in his last weekly speech from radio.
Mr.Bush said the biggest threat for America is the possibility of any other terrorist attack. He warned that enemies of the state are waiting patiently and they are targeted to attack again.
Discharging President said that America must never be negligent of her defense.
President Bush conveyed best wishes for upcoming President Barack Obama, who will sworn in on Tuesday.
Newly elected President Barack Obama threw light from the platform of Democratic party on the historical importance of Oath ceremony in his speech on weekly radio.
He said that the ceremony is such a tradition in which the peaceful transfer of powers is deeply tied to American greatness.
Mr. Obama reminded that many people even can't imagine that their leaders will quit the authority without struggle or bloodshed.

hl.seg: Meeting in Raiwind between Sharif Brothers and Federal Minister for Interior; Political and security issues were discussed.

doc.seg: The largest opposition party in the center and the ruling party in Punjab, the Pakistan Muslim League’s leader Nawaz Sharif and Federal Minister for Interior Rehman Malik met in Raiwind on Sunday; the meeting was also attended by the Chief Minister of Punjab Shahbaz Sharif.
According to local media, Rehman Malik brought a message from the leadership of Pakistan Peoples Party.

But talking to journalists after the meeting, Rehman Malik did not mention any details about this matter and only stated that he came to talk about building consensus on political issues and to brief the PML(N)’s leadership on the aftermath of the Mumbai attacks.
He said, “I informed them about the steps which have been taken so far”.
“Don’t forget that the major crackdown was done in Punjab by the Punjab Government and the team which I have formed now will also require help from the Punjab Government”.

Rehman Malik said that the media is not briefed every day but messages are exchanged with PML(N)’s leadership on daily basis. On the other hand, Pakistan Muslim League spokesman, Pervaiz Rasheed, also refrained from talking about any of the political issues and only stated that Rehman Malik had told everything which was important.

It should be noted that the Interior Minister met with the Pakistan Muslim League’s leadership at such a time when 20 Nazims belonging to PML(Q), the opposition party in Punjab, held a press conference with Governor Salman Taseer. PML(N), while dismissing the objections of the Nazims against steps taken by the provincial government objected to the involvement of the Punjab Governor, member of Pakistan Peoples Party, in this matter.

hl.seg: Speech of Obama is pleasing for Pakistan: President Zardari.

doc.seg: While welcoming the inaugural address of American President Barak Obama, the President of Pakistan Asif Ali Zardari has said that the mutual interest and to encrouage relationship among muslim world shown by him is pleasing for Pakistan and its people.
In a statement on Wednesday he said that the revision of high values and respect by President of America is good for all the people in the world for a better future.

As per the statement the President Zardari has said that the responsibility lies on America to search new ways for peace, development and prosperity with the help of universal brothers in the twenty first century.

It is obvious that on Tuesday President Obama, after taking oath as President of America, in his inaugural address has said that America is interested in developing new ties and relationship with muslim world.
He had assured the people of poor countries that America should work with them for social development and to reduce poverty.

hl.seg: President Obama has appointed a special representative for Afghanistan and Pakistan.

doc.seg: Richard Holbrook, ex ambassador for UN Richard Holbrook has been appointed as special representative for Pakistan and Afghanistan.

Holbrook said that he is ready for the consultancy of President Obama for Afghanistan and Pakistan.
He added that it is not an easy job.
He said that the history of both the countries is different.

Mitchell is ex senator and he played a key role for the establishment of peace in Northern Ireland.
While speaking in State Department Mitchell said that the situation of Middle East is very dangerous, complex and unpredictable.
But even though America will not step back from the attempts of establishment of peace.

hl.seg: Tea: An effective treatment of Lung Cancer.

doc.seg: New research shows that drinking three cups of tea day
greatly reduces the risk of the lung cancer in women under the age of 50.
This research from the Moffet Cancer Centre in Florida says that the chances of contracting lung cancer in women under the age of 50
who drink tea three times a day, are reduced by 37%
The research also said that having more than three cups of tea daily in women over the age of 50 has on special benefits.
Experts believe that the reason behind this is that tea has some elements that are effective against the formation of cancer cells in women mainly under the age of 50.
More than 5000 women who had lung cancer were treated in the Moffet Cancer Center, in Tampa, Florida.
They were aged between 29 to 74.
Researchers compared their medical records and lifestyles to women who were free of lung cancer.
Experts also discovered that tea was mainly effective on a certain type of cancer, called lopler, and was reduced by 66 %.
Every 10th patient of lung cancer falls under this type of cancer.
This type of cancer is especially dangerous because it is deeper than most, and is usually only discoverable when it has spread significantly.
Experts say that younger females can greatly reduce the risk of lung cancer by regularly drinking three cups of tea every day.
They say that incorporating tea in the daily life can greatly reduce the risk of any cancer.
In Britain, more than 40,000 women are diagnosed with lung cancer every year.

hl.seg: Why is there decrease in exercise with increase in age?
New Research.

doc.seg: Exercise is good for health in any age.
This makes your heart stronger, decreases cholesterol levels, helps in reducing weight, helps stop diabetes and decreases the chances of Alzheimer's.
Unfortunately, a lot of people tend to exercise less with age.
Experts say that exercises keeps our mind and body alert, and affects the real age of a person.
According to the American Medical Association, not getting enough exercise can lead to numerous health issues.
Dr. Patricia Paylekka of the Mew Clinic of Minnesota reports that with increase in age, exercise is a major factor in determining proper body functioning.
Dr Patricia teaches Medicine in Mew Clinic.
She has done extensive research on older age and the ability to exercise with increasing age.
A team of doctors used High Frequency rays to determine the functioning of the heart.
In which, the ability of the heart to pump blood, and it's ability to shrink and relax was researched.
Experts have concentrated mainly on the left side of the heart which is mainly responsible for the pumping of blood.
They discovered that with increase in age, the problems in the rate of heart relaxation also increase.
Dr. Patricia says that with increase in age, the problems in the heart relaxation rates increases and thus effects the ability to exercise with growing age.
Dr. Carwin Cain was also part of this research.
He says that it's surprising to see the permanent effects of improper exercise on the heart.
In some instances, blood pressure is a factor in heart anomalies and heart diseases.
If doctors and patients can work together when it comes to heart diseases, then they can enjoy the benefits of exercise even with older age.
There has been a detailed report about this in the American Medical Association Publication.

hl.seg: No chances of instant war with Pakistan: Indian Army Chief

doc.seg: Indian Army Chief General Deepak Kapoor says that no chances of instant war with Pakistan, however for the defense of country and to assure the security of her interests we are always vigilant.
General Kapoor blamed that despite of sureties and International pressure in result of Mumbai attacks, in his words, terrorism network is not only present in Pakistan but is also active.
He said this in Srinagar while talking to correspondents.
Indian Army Chief was on a day's tour of Kashmir for the analysis of preparations of armed forces on borders and of complete defense situation in New Delhi administered Kashmir.
He was asked that according to media reports Pakistan has refused the proves of Mumbai attacks presented by India, what is his opinion in this regard?
General Kapoor said that decisions of war or peace affairs are managed by political leadership.
Talking about the alleged terrorism network in Pakistan he said that Indian Army will have to face the forces which are objected to destroy peace and weaken India.
He said that 700 to 800 militants are present in Indian Kashmir almost half of them are foreigners.
General Deepak Kapoor said with the betterment of weather attempts of slander may increase from Pakistan and her side of Kashmir, however India has increased vigilance on borders.
He refused the chances of reducing the number of deployed army in Indian administered Kashmir by saying that no compromise on country security.

Most elders of our family belonged to labor class.
And when we in our childhood we used to see our uncles doing strenuous labor it gave birth to this desire in our heart that God protects us from strenuous physical labor.
To seek refuge from it we wrote a letter to the editor of daily Amroz and asked “what should we do after matriculation exams that we don’t have to go through strenuous physical labor.
Editor in his reply wrote that we should become a doctor or an engineer and should opt for such and such subjects to study.
From the beginning we were inclined toward engineering and also in metric we opted for technical drawing instead of biology.
But at the time of admission in FSC elder brother insisted on doing FSC in Pre Medical and become a doctor.
We hardly studied biology for a month and when we couldn’t understand a thing we swapped biology for Mathematics.
It means that the fear of strenuous physical jobs made us to become engineers and now we are well placed among many the youth of our family and for this we are thankful to God
This we remembered when we were trying to lift carpet from our old house with our two young sons.
It was not even 30 minutes for us working that our younger son said “Dad it feels like I am not born for this job.
We said if it is true then study hard like us and free yourself from physical labor.
Son started saying that I am studying and will complete my studies but I can’t do this work .
Three of us somehow managed to finish the job and got back home.
What it means is that when a man decides the destination no matter what were the motives behind this no one can stop him from getting it.
But if you don’t even know what you have to do then God be with you.

American high officials have stated that President Obama will take a stern attitude towards the Afghan President Hamid Karzai.
The new American strategy towards Afghanistan will focus on war instead of development

The officials said that Hamid Karzai is being viewed as an obstacle in achieving American interests in Afghanistan because of government corruption and drug trafficking is on the rise and the Talibans are gaining strength

The American officials also said that those people in the current administration who are pressurizing Hamid Karzai to do more include, Vice President Joe Biden and American Envoy for Afghanistan and Pakistan, Richard Holbrook

They stated that the policy change came after President Bush left office, who used to have video conferencing with Hamid Karzai fortnightly and emphasized the American role in the rebuilding of Afghanistan and its civil institutions.
The Obama administration will work with provincial political leaders instead of the central government.
They said that they will ask Hamid Karzai to intensify the campaign against corruption.
Hamid Karzai is facing new elections this year and it is not yet clear whether Obama and his administration are going to back him up in the presidential race.

After this journalist removed his shoe and threw it at Bush, President bush expertly moved his head out of the way and saved himself.
Second shoe hit the American flag.
Security officials dragged him out of there.
On this occasion President Bush said I don't know why he did this, shoe was of size 10, I was not bothered.

After the terrorists attacks on Mumbai the tension between India and Pakistan relations worsen when fighter planes of Indian Air Force violated the air space limit of Pakistan in Lahore and Kashmir sectors.
Due to the counter action of Pakistan Air Force Indian planes were forced to return.
According to resources both Indian planes were fully armed.
In the current tensed situation it is the first incident of its own kind.
Pakistan Air Force says that Air Force is fully vigilant to defend the country.
Minister of Information Sherry Rehman says India has admitted that it was a violation of air space limit, however it was a mistake.
Pakistan Army resources declared this incident as crucial.
Do you think India really intends to launch an air attack on Pakistan?
Is India's claim is correct that this violation was a mistake or it was objected to measure the capability of Pakistan Air Force.
Not this incident will increase tension between the two countries?
Tell us your opinion.
